content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ext_csv_scr_file_inf
(
  -- you must define the column list/types here to match your target table
  -- Example placeholders: replace with actual schema
  CSV_File_Name    varchar(500),
  Raw_GitHub_URL   varchar(1000),
  Target_Path      varchar(1000),
  Has_Header       bit,
  Delimiter        varchar(10),
  Schema_Definition varchar(max),
  Load_Status      varchar(100),
  Load_Timestamp   datetime2,
  Comments         varchar(max),
  Toimport         int,
  DataLayer        varchar(50)
)
WITH (
  LOCATION = 'csv_metadata/csv_scr_file_inf.parquet',  -- relative to the external data source LOCATION
  DATA_SOURCE = MyADLSDataSource,
  FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFormat
);
